projects.name: ACMHackathon2025
projects.description: Achieved 2nd place in ACM at CSUSM's first hackathon as a solo developer.

projects.name: Transcribo
projects.description: A Python script using Google Speech Recognition API for transcription.

projects.name: ConvertToGif
projects.description: A Bash script using ffmpeg and giflossy to mass convert all .mp4 files in a given folder to optimized .gif files.

projects.name: Autoclicka
projects.description: A minimalist Python script using tkinter and pynput to create a robust automatic clicking application (i.e. autoclicker).
